column2: Tom zajechōł na tanksztela zatankować swoji auto.
column4: Tom drove to the petrol station to fuel his car.

column2: Oferujymy pōmoc dlŏ telkich, co niy gŏdajōm po ślōnsku.
column4: We offer help to those people who do not speak Silesian.

column2: Jŏr to je fajnŏ pora roku.
Jŏr to je fajnŏ pora roku.
